author: andygumbrecht
msg: The JMS xbean configuration, eg. BrokerXmlConfig xbean:file:conf/activemq.xml, was not creating and holding on to the broker for shutdown. If the broker was not configured with a shutdown hook (which is bad from an RA perspective) then this would lead to persistence corruption.

author: erans
msg: Removed try/catch blocks misused as preconditions check.
